Player History
Released by New York (N) on 6/12/1966...
Drafted in 1st round, 16th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1967...
Released by Baltimore on 3/2/1967...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 3/2/1967 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 4/11/1967 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/22/1969 with a Strained Tricep Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles to Cleveland on 1/31/1970 (Going to LA: P C. Compton. Going to CLE: LF D. Baker)...
Had first career hit on 7/23/1970, off Jim Manning (MIN)...
Injured on 8/20/1970 with a Stress Fractured Ulna, out for 3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 5/11/1972, off Sparky Lyle (BOS)...
Drove in 6 runs against Minnesota on 4/30/1975...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 7/16/1975...
